Class PlayRisk

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.PlayRisk

  • public class PlayRisk
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for playing the game acts as GameEngine. Covers tasks ranging from 'map editing' to 'actual game play'. Responsible for only interacting with the user and calling appropriate methods for further actions.
